invalidCreater: [InvalidCreater] The key "{key}" is not a valid creater function.
missingCreateProjectName: [MissingProjectName] The create project command must have a project name.
missingCreateRepoName: [MissingRepoName] The create repo command must have a repo name.
missingProjectRepo: [MissingProjectRepo] The command requires either a project or repo name.
missingTestCmd: [MissingTestCmd] The create test command requires a test property.
missingBase: [MissingBase] There must be either a "project" or a "repo" entry in the command line arguments.
invalidOperation: [InvalidOperation] The key "{key}" is not a valid operation function.
